sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_TN_ROLE_MENU.NEXTVAL AS ROLE_NO from dual
/* roleMenuDAO.insertRoleMenu */ /* 권한역할메뉴 등록 */ INSERT INTO TN_ROLE_MENU ( ROLE_NO /* 권한역할메뉴.역할_번호 */ , AUTHOR_ID /* 권한역할메뉴.권한_ID */ , MENU_ID /* 권한역할메뉴.메뉴_ID */ , CRTR_NO /* 권한역할메뉴.생성자_번호 */ , CREAT_DT /* 권한역할메뉴.생성_일시 */ , DELETE_AT /* 권한역할메뉴.삭제_여부 */ , UPDUSR_NO /* 권한역할메뉴.수정자_번호 */ , UPDT_DT /* 권한역할메뉴.수정_일시 */ ) VALUES ( #ROLE_NO# /* 권한역할메뉴.역할_번호 */ , #AUTHOR_ID# /* 권한역할메뉴.권한_ID */ , #MENU_ID# /* 권한역할메뉴.메뉴_ID */ , #CRTR_NO# /* 권한역할메뉴.생성자_번호 */ , SYSDATE /* 권한역할메뉴.생성_일시 */ , 'N' /* 권한역할메뉴.삭제_여부 */ , #UPDUSR_NO# /* 권한역할메뉴.수정자_번호 */ , SYSDATE /* 권한역할메뉴.수정_일시 */ )
sqlMap.delete: /* roleMenuDAO.deleteRoleMenu */ /* 권한역할메뉴 삭제(삭제여부:N -> Y) */ UPDATE TN_ROLE_MENU SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' /* 권한역할메뉴.삭제_여부 */ , UPDUSR_NO = #UPDUSR_NO# /* 권한역할메뉴.수정자_번호 */ , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE /* 권한역할메뉴.수정_일시 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND AUTHOR_ID = #AUTHOR_ID# /* 권한역할메뉴.권한_ID */ AND MENU_ID = #MENU_ID# /* 권한역할메뉴.메뉴_ID */
sqlMap.select: /* roleMenuDAO.selectRoleMenu */ /* 권한역할메뉴 조회 */ SELECT tnrolemenu.ROLE_NO /* 권한역할메뉴.역할_번호 */ , tnrolemenu.AUTHOR_ID /* 권한역할메뉴.권한_ID */ , tnrolemenu.MENU_ID /* 권한역할메뉴.메뉴_ID */ , tnrolemenu.CRTR_NO /* 권한역할메뉴.생성자_번호 */ , tnrolemenu.CREAT_DT /* 권한역할메뉴.생성_일시 */ , tnrolemenu.DELETE_AT /* 권한역할메뉴.삭제_여부 */ , tnrolemenu.UPDUSR_NO /* 권한역할메뉴.수정자_번호 */ , tnrolemenu.UPDT_DT /* 권한역할메뉴.수정_일시 */ FROM TN_ROLE_MENU tnrolemenu WHERE 1 = 1 AND tnrolemenu.ROLE_NO = #ROLE_NO# /* 권한역할메뉴.역할_번호 */

/* authorityDAO.selectAuthority */ /* 권한그룹 조회 */ SELECT tnauthority.AUTHOR_ID /* 권한그룹.권한_ID */ , tnauthority.AUTHOR_NM /* 권한그룹.권한_명칭 */ , tnmenu.MENU_NM /* 시스템메뉴.메뉴_명 */ , tnmenu.MENU_ID /* 시스템메뉴.메뉴_ID */ , tnmenu.URL /* 시스템메뉴.URL */ FROM TN_AUTHORITY tnauthority INNER JOIN TN_ROLE_MENU tnrolemenu ON tnrolemenu.AUTHOR_ID = tnauthority.AUTHOR_ID/* 권한역할메뉴.권한_ID */ AND tnrolemenu.DELETE_AT ='N' /* 권한그룹.삭제_여부 */ INNER JOIN TN_MENU tnmenu ON tnmenu.MENU_ID = tnrolemenu.MENU_ID /* 시스템메뉴.메뉴_ID */ AND tnmenu.USE_AT ='Y' /* 시스템메뉴.사용_여부 */ AND tnmenu.DELETE_AT ='N' /* 시스템메뉴.삭제_여부 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND tnauthority.USE_AT ='Y' /* 권한그룹.사용_여부 */ AND tnauthority.DELETE_AT ='N' /* 권한그룹.삭제_여부 */
/* roleMenuDAO.authorityList */ /* 권한코드 조회 */ SELECT AUTHOR_ID AS CODE_VAL , AUTHOR_NM AS CODE_NM FROM TN_AUTHORITY WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND DELETE_AT = 'N'
